Name: Horse
Desc: Can be used to pull a carriage at half-speed or ridden at full. Can carry up to 40u.

Name: Carriage (Large)
Desc:
Useless unless pulled by a horse or a traveler with a MleStr of 50 or higher.
Can carry up to 500u

Name: Carriage (Small)
Desc:
Useless unless pulled by a horse or a traveler with a MleStr of 25 or higher.
Can carry up to 250u.

Name: Boat (Small, Row)
Desc: Can only be used on water. Can carry up to 60u.

Name: Boat (Medium, Manual/Sail)
Desc: Can only be used on water (trust us, we tried). Can carry up to 750u.

Name: Boat (Large, Sail)
Desc: Can only be used on water. Requires at least 3 crew to operate. Can carry up to 1,500u

Name: Balloon (Small)
Desc: Can carry up to 80u. Requires 1 hour to prepare before lift-off.

Name: Balloon (Large)
Desc: Can carry up to 200u. Requires 2 hours to prepare before lift-off.

Name: Airship (Small)
Desc: A symbol of danger and war. Can carry up to 400u. Externally made Accuracy checks are reduced by 5.

Name: Airship (Large)
Desc: A symbol of war. Can carry up to 800u. Externally made Accuracy checks are reduced by 8.

Name: Wyrm
Desc: Otherwise known as a land-dragon. They can be ridden at full-speed or pull a carriage at half-speed. Can carry up to 60u,

Name: Arcanacycle
Desc: A bicycle that's been upgraded to harness the power of a sorcerous driver, granting it immense speed. Can carry up to 40u
